name: A Tech Hangout
tagline: Rants, raves, thoughts and ideas on technology, transhumanism, and open source.
body:
### Welcome to my Github.
Please feel free to hangout and poke around in the code.

The site being developed here is based on @nelsam's original code for his [Whispers of Abaddon](http://github.com/nelsam/whispers-of-abaddon). If you would like to fork it, please feel free to do so.

I'll add more here as I think of it :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
